## Buttercream `r vegan` {#sec-buttercream}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

1 butter \
1-2 icing sugar

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Add icing sugar and little milk to make stiffer or more spreadable.

*Notes*

- Can add vanilla, peppermint, lemon zest ...
- Can replace small amount of icing sugar with cocoa.
- For 8" [Victoria cake](#sec-victoria): 60g butter, 120g icing sugar.

##  Lemon curd `r vegan` {#sec-lemon-curd}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

120ml milk \
60ml lemon juice \
1tbsp lemon zest \
100g granulated sugar \
1tbsp cornstarch \
1tbsp butter \
turmeric

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Whisk over medium heat until thickens, about 5-10 mins.

*Notes*

- Will thicken a bit as it cools.
- Half of this is enough for [lemon sandwich biscuits](#sec-lemon-biscuits).

##  Mincemeat `r vegan` {#sec-mincemeat}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

400g dried fruit (currants, raisins, sultanas, cranberries, 50g mixed peel) \
1 small apple, finely chopped \
62g butter, cubed \
25g blanched almonds, chopped \ 
122g light brown sugar \
0.5tsp cinnamon \
0.5tsp mixed spice \
zest and juice of 0.5 lemon \
100ml apple juice (my sub for brandy/rum/sherry)

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

2 x 370g jars \
~28 pies

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Melt all ingredients, except juice/alcohol, allowing butter to melt.
1. Simmer 10 mins, stirring occasionally.
1. Cool completely then add juice/alcohol.
1. Pack into sterilised jars, pressing down to remove air bubbles.

*Notes*

- Used apple juice as a sub for alcohol. Could try earl grey tea?
- [Sterilise jars](#sec-jars). Stored in fridge for 2 weeks before use, but 
should be able to store for up to three months.
- Next time: add more spice and maybe 125ml apple juice?
- Either [shortcrust pastry](#sec-shortcrust) or [Mum's mince pie pastry](#sec-mum-mince-pastry).
